resources.string: Android Support Library, Apache Commons, Android icons by Opoloo

Copyright 2013-2014 Artem Chepurnoy. All Rights Reserved.

Many thanks to those open source tools: %1$s and to all who helped with translations or donated to me.

Welcome to the new version of AcDisplay! This update brings a completely new and unique design with a lot of new possibilities. The design is more streamlined and is aimed at giving you the best possible experience!

One touch for all actions.
Unlocking the device, checking the notifications or performing an actions on them can be done with a single motion.

Unlock field is anywhere and everywhere.
Swipe anywhere on free space to unlock.

Hello,
First of all I want to thank you for the amount of downloads and high ratings on Play Store. Huge progress has been made in AcDisplay and a this could not have been done without the community. That is why AcDisplay is open for everyone. But I need some help from you.
This is my last school year and I would like to buy a notebook for future studies and to bring the world awesome software wherever I may be. I would highly appreciate your help with it.
